summary: WHILE TAPPING THE BRAKES, THE VEHICLE'S HEADLIGHTS WILL DIM OCCASIONALLY. 2 TIMES NOW WHILE TAPPING THE BRAKES, THE ENTIRE DASHBOARD (INCLUDING THE TOUCHSCREEN) TURN OFF AND RESTART. THE FIRST TIME WAS TRAVELLING ON A HIGHWAY AND THE SECOND TIME WAS ON MY DRIVEWAY, I APPLIED THE BRAKES AND THE ENTIRE CAR SHUT DOWN, INCLUDING THE POWER STEERING, POWER BRAKES, AND ENGINE. THAT TIME I ROLLED OUT OF MY DRIVEWAY AND INTO THE ROAD. I WAS LUCKY NO ONE WAS COMING
